description:
This brief course is designed to show new students how to take a course on edX. You will learn how to navigate the edX platform and complete your first course! From there, we will help you get started choosing the course that best fits your interests, needs, and dreams.

Have questions before taking the demo course? Check our student FAQs. How to navigate the edX platform
	How to connect with other edX learners in a course
	How to answer problems on the edX platform
	How grades work in edX courses
	How to complete your first course
effort: From 10 - 30 minutes, or as much time as you want.
title: DemoX
